name: morgan ear warmer headband
notes:
the morgan ear warmer pattern is super easy to crochet and works up quickly! you can make a couple headbands in only an hour or two. 

this beginner friendly ear warmer headband crochet pattern is available in sizes child, teen and adult; with notes to downsize to toddler (12 mos - 24 mos) and small child (3-5 years).

additional sizing options are included in the 'notes' section of my pattern post and the stitch multiple is also provided.

the finished fabric has a soft, striped texture.

this warm and cozy wearable makes a great gift.

if you are using the same yarn as i used you can make 2 teen-sized or smaller headbands with 1 ball of yarn. 

**finished project yardage:** child: 1.54 oz (44 g) and 53 yds (48 m)  teen: 1.57 oz (45 g) and 54 yds (49 m) adult: 1.82 oz (52 g) and 62 yds (57 m)

**yarn colors:** child: cobblestone, teen: peninsula and adult: amethyst

♥ rhondda
